data.title: Robert L. Patton High School
data.meta_description: Home - Robert L. Patton High School
data.text:
We are completing senior casual portraits over the next few weeks.

If you have not had your senior portraits, we will be releasing more dates after school starts.

We will ensure that all seniors have the opportunity to get their casual formal portraits taken.

Formal Portraits will be taken in November with information to to follow.

Cap & Gown portraits will be taken in March 2025.

All students are required to pay the technology device fee for the 2024-2025 school year.

High School Students kept their devices over the summer, but still need to pay the technology fee! If they returned their device for the summer, they can pick it up in the media center.

Freshmen will be getting new devices.

It is $25 technology free for one student, $50 for two or more.

To avoid the wait, you can pay online MySchoolBucks.com (you may need to create a new account).

If you have any questions, please reach out to Whitney Lawson (media coordinator) @ whitneylawson@burke.k12.nc.us
